ComicInfo.Summary:
Team Scorpio's mission has taken them through the ravaged hometown of one of their own and all the way into the belly of the hive. Now, victory is in their sights, but these three wounded soldiers will have to fight through a Swarm resurgent to get it. One way or another, the mission ends here.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Alan Quah (a) & Sean Lee (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Pierre Droal | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:22:50. [CVDB743196]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Agustin Padilla, Alan Quah, Kieran McKeown
ComicInfo.Inker: Agustin Padilla, Alan Quah, Kieran McKeown
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alan Quah, Pierre Droal, Sean Lee
